description: Details of public realm lighting strategy required by condition 2d of reserved matters 2020/5885/P dated 10/03/2021 (for: Reserved matters relating to Building S4 for the erection of a 13 storey building above ground floor to provide 176 residential homes comprising 120 market and 56 social rented units with associated public realm works, as required by conditions 9, 10, 12, 14, 16-22, 24, 27, 28, 31, 33-39, 42, 42A, 43, 45, 46, 48, 49, 50A, 51, 56, 60, 61, 64-67 67 of outline planning permission reference 2004/2307/P granted 22/12/06 (subject to S106 agreement) for a comprehensive, phased, mixed-use development of former railway lands within the King's Cross Opportunity Area)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
